column1: event,"In 2003 I finally got a personal computer and it was while surfing the world wide web that I came across a story called Touch of Perfection by Kender. That one story opened my eyes to a new genre of fiction and it is a genre that I still read in 2015. I loved this story so much that I had to tell the author, who was kind enough to share thoughts and ideas with me. Especially when I told her that I had been inspired to try my own hand at fanfiction writing, using her story as a template which she graciously allowed. Not sure if anyone still uses livejournal but here is part 1:

column4: >SEDUCTION BY MOONLIGHT
>by Sandra
>  The invitation read &quot
column12: on a midnight blue background in silver lettering. The card was waiting on Riot&#39
column13: s desk when he returned from the Battle of the Bands. Just thinking of the trip brought a smile to Riot&#39
column14: s face, remembering the taste of the last passionate kiss he had shared with Rio. The memory made his emerald green eyes gleam. Bringing his attention back to the card, Riot wondered who sent it and why.

column4: >  Across the plaza at Starlight Music, Jerrica Benton was wondering the same thing. She too was holding the midnight blue card with silver lettering that read &quot
column12: . Turning the card over revealed a date and time plus the name of the newest hotspot, &quot
column20: . It was this coming Saturday at 10:00 p.m. Losing the Battle of the Bands to The Stingers coupled with the sudden turn in Rio&#39
column21: s attitude greatly unsettled Jerrica. She and the Holograms needed something to lighten the mood. This invitation could prove to be just the answer.

column4: >  Rio was sitting in his office at Starlight Music trying to get some work done when the phone rang. &quot
column5: Thinking of me, by any chance, Love?&quot
column6: came the soft voice over the telephone line.

column4: >  The pulse of heat running through Rio&#39

column4: >  &quot

column7: You might be surprised by the answer.&quot

column5: s voice turned the heat in Rio&#39
column6: s blood into a raging fire. Rio fought to not give voice to the moan rising in him. This stunning man already had far too much power over him and it scared Rio, a little. The depth of his emotions concerning the blonde singer were very overwhelming.

column4: >On the other end of the phone, Riot could hear the whisper of Rio&#39
column5: s quickening breath as well as the rising tension in his voice.&nbsp
column6: Ah, beautiful, beautiful man, you can try to run and put distance between us but you will learn that you belong to Riot now Rio, he thought, bringing his mind back to the reason for the phone call.

column4: >  The cause and reason behind all the speculation was relaxing in the back of a stretch limo. Moonlight is her name and she had come to take the music world by storm.&nbsp
column5: And anyone looking at her would say that all Moonlight had to do was stand still to rock the world.

column4: >Long black hair with one streak of pure white framed a face that could and had stopped traffic. Unusual eyes of clearest silver stared out at a world that would give her anything she wanted, had Moonlight but asked.
>Saturday would see her plans begin.
>On the other side of town, Eric Raymond was doing his level best to calm Pizzazz, lead singer of the Misfits, down. It was bad enough that The Misfits hadn&#39
column5: t been invited to the Battle of the Bands, now Pizzazz was throwing an even bigger fit. The Misfits had not been asked to play at the upcoming concert for the President. Finding out that Jem and the Holograms plus The Stingers would be headlining the show only made it worse.

column4: >But, maybe not for long, thought Eric as he patted the jacket pocket with the midnight blue invitation in it. He very much wanted something that would put Eric on top of the game again, instead of pretty boy Riot or that bitch Pizzazz.

>It was very late in the evening when Rio finally got back to his apartment and all he wanted was some food plus a long hot shower. But the moment he stepped into the apartment, Rio became aware of the heady aftershave.

column5: background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255)
column6: > Sometimes we come to that point in our lives when we realize how the world sees us and how we see ourselves is two very different things.
column16: >  I imagine that the world sees me as a very strange creature indeed. I am a 46 year old woman who still lives with her family and has never lived on her own. I can tell you there is a very good reason for that, like money and so on but that is a lot of BS. Because of the actions of two men in my life and the innocence it shattered, I am emotionally and physically unable to act and be a so-called mature adult. I feel like a teenager trapped in a body and life that I will never be able to escape from. I don&#39
column17: t say these things to cause anyone in my life hurt but I am simply tired of pretending to be something I am not.
column27: > I am alone in my world, I don&#39
column28: t have a group of friends I go out with. Those I think of as friends live a distance that makes such outings few and far between. I do have a family member that I talk to and confide in but I feel very much the downer for this person as I am not the fun-loving type of person. I spend most of my down time reading, watching MV&#39
column29: s on Youtube and watching T.V. Exciting life, isn&#39
column32: t party, would much rather sit and fangirl with those who understand my own set of strange likes.
column42: >  I love Korean pop music. Yes, I know that I am not Korean and that I can&#39
column43: t speak the language. I tried to listen to the music of today but most of it seemed to be about being pretty, rich, popular and as I am none of those things................. &nbsp
column44: Maybe that is why I like Kpop, I can just let the emotions of the singing translate what I would like them to be about, even if I am wrong. I also have a weakness for Asian men, love looking at them........especially if they are together.
column54: > Shocked you, have I? Why? If a grown hetrosexual men can like looking at and watching two girls getting it on with one another, then why can&#39
column55: t I, as a hetrosexual woman like looking at and watching two beautiful men getting it on? And it isn&#39
column56: t just looking, if you want to call it yaoi, slash or M/M...I love reading stories as well, books and fan-fiction. Maybe for me it is a matter of safety, I don&#39
column57: t have to worry about competing or putting myself out there and risk the pain of rejection.
column67: > Rejection. I have had way too much of that recently, I doubt I could stomach anymore. I make myself feel worthless enough, I don&#39
column68: t need outside sources adding weight to my convictions. Why am I worthless? Because there is nothing about me or what I bring to the world around that is special. I have no doubt that I could disappear today and nary a ripple would occur.
column78: > I wear a mask to hide from the world around me. That is what the outside world sees when they look at me, it smiles and laughs, tells jokes and goes with the flow but underneath there is very little of a real person anymore. I have spent so many years playing so many parts for the people I cross paths with that I no longer think there is a real me. The pieces I have shown you here are just that....pieces. There hasn&#39
column79: t been a whole real person since 1976......may she rest in peace.
column89: > And I will never speak of what I write here and if you ask me to my face I will simply stare at you and say nothing. I learned long ago never to trust the spoken word. If you must, then write.....and I may write back. &nbsp

column2: >The past few weeks are pushing me past my limits. Or I should say this whole year. First there was the disaster with my Kia that was not only testing my nerves but draining my bank account. After weeks of going back and forth with repairs that weren&#39
column3:
t working, it seem as if a ray of light finally shone through. Thanks to a little luck and another chunk of money from the savings account I was able to purchase a new car, at least newer for me, a 2010 Chevy Cobalt. For awhile it seemed as if things were improving and the rest of the year might be worth it after all.

Not so...............

Several week ago my mother was diagnosed with breast cancer. On the 29th of May she went in for surgery and now she will have to face a round of chemo and radiation starting towards the end of June. I want to be able to help her but I am already so tired and there is more to come. I am not sure I have the strength to be the main caregiver in this family. I am getting little to no help from my brother who lives in this household too. He has a special needs child who my mother was the main caregiver for. She was the one who got her ready for school and spent the most time with her while I was at work. His only job was changing and bathing her. Now with Mom going through this, how am I suppose to hold it together?

I don'
column4: t think I can. My head hurts all the time and all I want is to close my eyes and sleep. All I want to do is to escape into the realm of dreams and never leave. Is that a wish for insanity?&nbsp
column5:
Sandra
"

column1: event,"and I feel nothing. I look at the world around me and I wonder why am I here. I am alive but I don't really live. I smile and laugh, play at being a normal person, yet all my feelings seem to only be on the surface. Does that make me shallow or am I just someone who has no feelings. I feel invisible in both my life and work...yet I don't think I care. I hope for better things yet am not surprised when things go bad.&nbsp
column2: Would anyone notice if I disappeared from the world...would I even notice."

column1: event,"Lately I have become somewhat obsessed with Criminal Minds...LOL&nbsp
column2: The yaoi fangirl in me loves the idea of a Morgan/Reid pairing, have even been reading fanfiction for it .&nbsp
column3: Am spending the day going back and forth watching two Criminal Minds marathons on both ION and A&amp

column1: Anybody out there know any good fanfics for Criminal Minds???&nbsp
event,"I am so tired of being sick!!!!!!&nbsp
column2: Have been fighting with pneumonia for the past two weeks and I am so tired of coughing, can barely speak two whole sentences before I am overcome with a fit. Can't stand to eat anything because it makes me sick to my stomach. I am on heavy duty meds right now which make work really interesting.....

column1: All I want to do is go home, crawl under ten blankets and sleep until I am healthy again.
event,"<div>I have been out of the loop today until a few hours&nbsp
column2: ago when I turned on the computer.&nbsp
column3: Now I can't stop crying, I feel like something truly special is now gone from the world.&nbsp
column4: The news of <span class=""yshortcuts"" id=""lw_1201055545_0"" style=""CURSOR: hand
column5: BORDER-BOTTOM: #0066cc 1px dashed"">Heath Ledger's passing has knocked the breath from me.......Brokeback Mountain has held a
column6: place in my heart since the moment I first viewed it and to lose one of the actors that brought this wonderful and tragic story to life, it breaks my heart.
column7: I pray that the Goddess watches over Heath and grants him peace.
column8:
I also pray that She holds his family in Her loving arms....as well as all who were touched by this amazing person.



Blessed Be
Sandra
column10: This is a really sad birthday for me......................."

event,"For the first five people that reply to me and re-post this challenge, I will send you something. It might be something I've made, or something cool from my hidden stash, it might be a mix CD, or a rubber duck, a book I think you will enjoy, or something else that is awesome. column1: event,"I still live, even if it seems I have disappeared.&nbsp
column2: Right now I have no internet, no phone and the only way friends can get in touch with me is when I am at work.&nbsp
column4: But I am still hanging in there...I have rediscovered some of my writing muses, been re-reading one of my favorite Jem fics and my muses are wanting me to work on my own...LOL&nbsp
column5: I am still reading Gundam Wing yaoi, will never give that up, but it is hard to do that at work.....&nbsp
column6: Just really want a phone and internet right now...LOL

event,"I didn't think that depression could hit me this fast, it has been years since this kind of black feeling has overcome me.  I look around at my life and wonder why I ever bother anymore, I am so unhappy and the pain is almost unbearable.  Work is a struggle, Mom leaves me feeling drained and numb.  I would scream if I thought it would do any good, but I doubt anybody would hear me.  More and more I find myself just wanting to sleep and sleep
column2: it use to scare me when I got like this, was afraid I would never wake.  Now I feel a sense of peace and seek that sleep more.

column1: I don't know...maybe.  All I know is that I am so tired.  Right now there is only one thing that brings me any kind of joy and those I live with make me feel like shit for seeking that little bit of happiness.

column3: '>You Are a Prophet Soul

column1: You are a gentle soul, with good intentions toward everyone.
Selfless and kind, you have great faith in people.
Sometimes this faith can lead to disappoinment in the long run.
No matter what, you deal with everything in a calm and balanced way.
You are a good interpreter, very sensitive, intuitive, caring, and gentle.
Concerned about the world, you are good at predicting people's feelings.
A seeker of wisdom, you are a life long learner looking for purpose and meaning.
You are a great thinker and communicator, but not necessarily a doer.

Souls you are most compatible with: Bright Star Soul and Dreaming Soul
What Kind of Soul Are You?
"

What Tarot Card Are You?

event,"

Get your own spectral analysis from Area 23®

event,"Last friday at this time I had just returned from Lexington after seeing Brokeback Mountain and after a week I still can't get that movie out of my head. Having read Annie Proulx's Close Range/Wyoming Stories, the collection of stories that has Brokeback Mountain in it, I knew storywise what was going to happen.  Still I was caught up in what is a true human love story and by the end was weeping like a heartbroken child.  There have been very few movies that have had that effect on me, I could count them on one hand.  The love and heartbreak between Jack and Ennis had me gasping for breath, as if my heart were being squeezed in my chest. Also thanks to this movie, I have fallen completely in love with Jake Gyllenhaal...LOL  He is sooooooo beautiful!!!!!!!!  If you haven't seen this movie yet, I highly recommend it.  This is not as a lot in the press have called ""a gay cowboy movie"".  This is a love story about two human beings who because of the outside world cannot be together.  And that is the true tragedy that had me and so many other who came out of the movie crying our eyes out."

event,"Went back to work this week after taking time off for OhayoCon, then a week's vacation.  I soooo did not want to go back to work, kinda got use to being able to stay up late, read GW fanfics and sleep late in the morning...*sigh*

OhayoCon was a total blast, ran around with Cherokee, tkmaxwell777 and my cousin starshinehigh. *makes a mental note to watch self around TK and Jo, the two of them nearly killed me with the giggles on friday night*  This year I was able to get video of Scott and some of the other VA's, so I can go back and relive some of the memories...that will have to hold me until OhayoCon '07'  Although the con was great and I had so much fun, it did end on a bit of a sour note.  On sunday morning when Mom, Jo and I went down to the main programming room for the panel with Scott McNeil and Michael Dobson there was a small line formed at one end of the hall and two girls who were named the 'slut twins' by a nameless source were telling any who arrived that there was two lines, one for those attending the panel and signing and another just for the signing.  Sounds reasonable, right.

There was no two lines and those who were standing in the panel line were told that they would have to be last in line for the signing since the panel with Scott and Michael was cancelled.  With my hurt knee, I was in no shape to be at the end of a long line, so with Cherokee we just left to hit the dealer's room one last time before heading back to Kentucky.  I did leave my 'Scott Stalker' t-shirt with Cherokee as she said she might head back to the signing later, if it was still going on.

She called me later that day and told me that they had put Scott and Michael outside the main programming room and they were still signing at 5pm.  The signing started around 11am that morning and those poor guys weren't given any kind of breaks or even lunch.  Just hope this doesn't sour them on coming back again.  Cherokee did get both of our t-shirts signed by Scott *he is such a sweetie!* and she sent mine back to me, came in yesterday's mail.  If Scott comes back for OhayoCon '07', I hope to get a pic with him...missed out this year....:(
Well, it is time for bed, so Good Night to all!!!

event,"There are only 8 days till OhayoCon '06' and my mind has already started making lists.  What do I need to remember to take with me, making sure I have all the right paperwork and so on.......  I keep checking weather.com to look at the 10 day forecast and all looks good on that front.  I really can't wait for this, have a surprise for Tonja and seeing Cherokee again, plus the surprise for Scott.  Need to remind myself to get pictures with them this time...lol  One thing different from last year is that I am going to have a video camera *look out Scott and Greg*  I am soooo ready...LOL
event,"OhayoCon is coming...about 44 days and counting.  Can't wait to stalk Scott McNeil, meet up with TK and Cherokee again and just have fun, without people thinking I am too strange or weird.

event,"I am much more calm now and less likely to hurt someone.  I guess I just needed to vent.  It is just that the one thing I am truly looking forward to, well...I feel like it is being threatened.  Between work and family, I feel like I am so tightly bound that I can't move one way or another.  OhayoCon is the light at the end of the tunnel and the one thing keeping me sane right now.  I keep praying that the days will move quickly. But for now, I think I will close my eyes and go to sleep.  Work tomorrow, you know.

event,"Have you ever wondered if fate hates you and nothing in your life can go right?  I find myself thinking about that more and more.  I love my family, but my mother is going to drive me fucking insane.  I get the feeling more and more that I have the letters A.T.M tattooed on my forehead.  Since when am I expected to pick up all the money slack in this family.  I don't mind helping out with some of the bills, but dammit...I am the only one.  I am angry right now because in January I am going to OhayoCon *crosses fingers* and have been putting money away here and there, got a nice little bundle going.  But tonight my mother tells me that she will more then likely be borrowing it to make the down-payment on her new car.  Why the fuck am I the one she looks to when she needs money
column2: my brother is living in the same house too.  I don't see him paying any bills, except child support.  If I could swing it right now, I would be out of this house in a heartbeat.

column1: The one whom the fates hate.....

After being without a computer for so many months, I am back online.  And guess what, I am gearing up for the next OhayoCon...LOL  About 126 days and counting, I think.  Right now most of my time is taken up with work and an online class I have to take for my job, but I hope to post more on the LJ now and hopefully add more friends.  So till then, Nighty-night!!!!

event,"
You're the Death and the Dragon kind of lovin'!
Lots of tender love and emotion in this
pairing, once they get past the hurdles
there's nothing but stability and
protectiveness. 2x5/5x2 together forever!

What Gundam Wing Yaoi Couple Are You? (Results contain pictures)
brought to you by Quizilla"

event,"I had such a blast at Ohayocon that I was really sad when it ended.  After the con I only had to go back to work for two days before I was off for six whole days.  A much needed vacation, I might add.  Got to spend six days sleeping...lol  I really didn't want to go back to work.

Ohayocon was better then I imagined.  It was way bigger then Sugoicon with more to do, bigger dealer's room and more guests.  Greg rocks!!!...and Scott is awesome!!!  Met Vic Mignogna and am now a fan of his too.  At his and Scott's signing, I thought I was going to laugh myself sick over some of the stuff Vic was doing with this puppet a fan gave him.  I managed to get not one, not two but in fact three hugs from Scott McNeil. I was told that he was a hugger, but until now I hadn't really been sure.  I am *sure* now...LOL  I am such a fangirl now, it isn't funny.  Got a picture with Scott and one with Greg, but missed out on getting one with Vic... got pulled away by Scott...LOL
Am already planning on going again next year, January 6-8, 2006.  I have been told that Scott, Greg and Vic are already confirmed to be there...LOL   366 days to go...lol

event,"Only one more day left before Ohayocon and I am about ready to jump out of my skin.  I am doing anything and everything to make the time pass more quickly, but it still isn't passing fast enough...LOL  I am so ready!!!!!

event,"It is coming down to the wire and I am sooo ready..^___^  Can barely get thru the day at work my mind is so alread on this weekend...lol  I plan on having fun...fun...FUN!!!!!  Ohayocon and Scott McNeil had better watch out cause here I come...LOL

event,"'Where's the Buffet?' from Sugoicon is going to be at Ohayocon and they will be doing panels there...lol  http://www.ohayocon.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=976  Might even be able to go to the Hentai a go-go panel this time...lol

btw, Jo...we will be swinging around Winchester at 7am on Friday.  So far the weather is calling for snow and temps of 33 that day, so we want to get moving as quickly as possible and not have to rush.

event,"8 days and counting til Ohayocon....lol  I am sooooooo ready for this!  Scott McNeil and Greg Ayres...*giggles like a fangirl*  The days cannot move fast enough for me, but when I finally get there I know time will past far too quickly...*sigh*

event,"A new year has begun and I hope that it goes well.  The past year has had its ups and downs for me, but I think this year will start out better then the last.  Twelve days and counting...lol  For me the new year will start off with Ohayocon.  I am completely and utterly excited about this trip, even had a dream about it last night.  I was sitting next to Jo, my cousin and I spotted Scott McNeil on the stage in the room where we were.  The I saw Greg Ayres, with blue hair...lol, and he waved at us....lol  So I have hope that the dream is telling me that things will go well...*crossing fingers*  Their is a GW fanfic writer that I hope to meet there as well, TK Maxwell.  She has promised to drag me around the con....I can't wait...^____^
I hope the coming year brings you all the joy and happiness that you could ever wish for.

event,"Tomorrow is Christmas Eve and I am all hyped about that, but what I am really looking forward to is in 22 days.  Can we say OHAYOCON!!...lol  Can ya tell I am excited?...^__~  I just pray that the weather isn't bad, not that would really stop me.  If I have to buy and bolt a snow plow to the front of my car to get there...well then, thats just what I will do.  I had such a blast at Sugoicon in Covington, Ky and this one is going to be twice as big.  Not to mention....*pause*...Greg Ayres and Scott McNeil are both going to be there.

I guess it is kinda funny, most people want to meet rock stars, movie and TV stars, but not me...I want to meet anime voice actors...lol  I would love to meet or at least see all the english voice actors from Gundam Wing, Saiyuki, Weiss Kreuz and Gravitation, just to name a few...lol  I did get to meet Greg Aryes who does Son Goku in Saiyuki and he was really nice...*smiley face*  Now at Ohayocon I will see him again and maybe even get a pic with him...lol, plus the bonus of Scott McNeil (Duo Maxwell-Gundam Wing) being there too.
As one has no doubt noticed, I'm really excited about this con...lol

event,"Just sitting here relaxing and dreading work tomorrow.  Kentucky is gearing up for some nasty weather and the library will be dead tomorrow, but we still have to come into work even if there is six feet of snow on the ground.  Oh well, maybe fate will smile on me....lol, yeah right.  *snort*  As soon as the holidays are over I can really start counting down to Ohayocon...*bounces like Tigger*  I am going to go see Scott McNeil and Greg Ayres....yikes, I can't wait...LOL
I have created this live journal and have no real idea what I am doing or even how this whole site works.  Any suggestions would be very helpful and I would be grateful...^__^
